subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Vincent Lecavalier got his 49th goal of the season and Filip Kuba scored 55 seconds into overtime last night as the Tampa Bay Lightning stopped a three-game losing streak with a 4-3 victory against the visiting Islanders.
snippet: Vincent Lecavalier got his 49th goal of the season and Filip Kuba scored 55 seconds into overtime last night as the Tampa Bay Lightning stopped a three-game losing streak with a 4-3 victory against the visiting Islanders.
